name: Wrap Dispenser with Cutter and Labels for Kitchen Drawer - Organizer for Drawer Compatible with 11-inch Rolls - Individual Bag Organizer for Sandwich, Snack and Quart
description:
Our Bamboo Wall Wrap Dispenser, crafted from high-quality material, is both lightweight and durable. This four-in-one foil and plastic wrap dispenser with cutter provides stability on any counter and can easily fit into your kitchen drawer. The instilled slide cutter ensures precise dispensing and cutting, with a safe design that conceals the blade to prevent you from any injuries during use.
 Be sure to measure your drawer. Our foil holder is 13 x 11 x 3 inches. It is compatible with most 11 inch wrapping rolls available in the market, and you can also use it for Aluminum foil, Wax, and Parchment Paper. The polished and smooth surface of the plastic wrap dispenser makes it moisture-proof. Included in the package are 16 different labels and screwdrivers for convenient wall mounting.
